website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for consumers who like the designer look without the price, though it lacks the space of other models we tested.
pros: Attractive leather messenger bag that's built to last
A good option for professional looks and on-the-job use
cons: Some users noticed a chemical smell from the faux leather material, though it fades over time

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag. Heavier than expected because the leather thicker than I thought. That is a good thing. Has a zipper inside so your stuff does not fall out. The buckles are nice and sturdy but I wish they had a snap behind them so you didn't have to buckle and unbuckle the bag to get in and out of it. This was you could access the bag a little easier and keep the look of the buckled bag if you don't want to buckle it. There are two snaps to hold the leather part down but they are higher up.
customer_reviews.author: Renae M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I normally do not write reviews but I thought I would for this bag. As everyone is, most likely, I came to Amazon to find a good messenger bag but for a decent price. I found this Otium bag, read the reviews and opted to buy this one after all my research on other bags. The bag arrived after only 2 days and I cannot say how pleased I am with it. It is a beautiful bag. A little on the smaller side but it does have a padded area if you happen to have a smaller lap top or notebook. But overall an excellent bag and excellent craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag but poorly thought-out design
customer_reviews.text: If there were a separate rating for aesthetics, I would give this bag five stars for it's beauty alone. Functionally however, the bag suffers due to it's loose magnetic buckles. The magnets on the buckles attach to rivets on the bag and make it so that you have the option of simply snapping the magnets in place to secure the bag or actually threading/unthreading the leather straps. The problem is that the magnetic buckles are loose and can easily fall off if you are not paying attention. I've had my bag for about three months now and have lost both buckles already. Needless to say, that's very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Truman Brown

customer_reviews.title: quality bag
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality bag. Great bag for the price. Strong canvas material. Leather nice quality that looks like wear will add character. Very pleased with the design -- outer pocket that would be next to your body if carrying that you could have easy access to phone with, interior zipped pocket with divided inside and another zipped pocket, interior compartment open pockets that work well for charging accessories, not sure what I'd use two open pockets under flap for but good to have non the less. Got this to have one bag to keep all my electronics and their accessories handy in. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: tennessee vol

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag every day for work. It carries my portfolios, papers, and Macbook Air with zero problems. It is durable and made from quality materials. The leather is thick and looks good - the canvas is, well canvas. With this bag, the more you use it, the more wear and tear it suffers - the better it looks. That's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best value , awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered many items from Amazon and this briefcase is the best ever ! Bag arrived ahead of schedule , exceeded my expectations. Looks even better in person than on line. Leather is soft feeling , looks great in combination with the canvass. Lots of room for tablet, binder, books etc. outside back compartment secured with two snaps and great for additional items. Front snaps easy and work well keeping bag secure. For added security there are the belts. And for the price , this bag is outstanding value. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a functional bag that both looks great , professional yet casual.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I've had it for about 6 months and use it almost daily. My 13" laptop won't fit in the padded pocket but I can squeeze it into the bigger compartment. I've also been using it as a book bag or a carry on for international travel and have not a single complaint. It carries very comfortably even with weight in it and the leather has been aging beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality bag with nice leather detail
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate! This is a good quality bag with nice leather detail. Plenty of pocket/storage options and even a padded divide space for smaller electronics. I purchased the green and it's a perfect "washed" neutral color. Love this bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Now this a knapsack! I've never used one of these before but I now find myself traveling a great deal more on day trips. This handbag is perfect for carrying books, documents, escape plans, etc. Love it. Plus it is masculine. I get lots of compliments about it. I also love that it is sturdy and rugged. Zippers and snaps are going to hold up over time. If you're browsing this and undecided...just get it. You'll dig it.
customer_reviews.author: kjcheek

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was for my husband, and he loves it! The leather has a really nice distressed look to it. You would almost think we paid much more for it too. It fits his Macbook Pro perfectly, which we were concerned about - great product! Arrived timely as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: The bags looks as good as it does in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Please note that this bag is on the smallish side. Some of my classmates commented that I had a cute new purse. The bags looks as good as it does in the pictures, but after a month or two one of the clasps came apart. Between the size and quality, I cannot recommend this man-purse.
customer_reviews.author: Alan V

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like It
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag. It fits my 14" laptop, my 7" Kindle Fire along with cords, mouse and other odds and ends with room to spare. The quality of materials and workmanship are superb and it is nice looking. I would buy it again. I don't think a laptop larger than 14" would fit though.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag and certainly well priced
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as gift for my son. I guess messenger bags are replacing backpacks for college now. Good quality bag and certainly well priced. No sense in paying hundreds of dollars for something which is as good if not less. Seems durable, although it was just received.
customer_reviews.author: letti001

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: Every part was excellent for carry.. materials sturdy and durable.... fast ship...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The handbag looks great and feels high quality. I have 2 critiques though: spacewise it is limited, it is smaller than the described dimensions lead you to think. The second one, and most important, the belts are attached to the bag by magnets, so it doesn't feel very secure. I will try to wield them in order to make it functional.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo Melini

customer_reviews.title: Very classy bag
customer_reviews.text: Great messenger bag / satchel / man purse. It feels good and looks manly. If you're going to carry one, it should certainly be this one. The leather feels nice and the rugged fabric all speak quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Gootium bag and are well made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one before and I loved it, that's why I didn't hesitate to get it again. This new version does not have magnets in the front flap, and it looks safer than the older version.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Too much
customer_reviews.text: This product was not what I expected. It is attractive, but it is larger than I expected and much too heavy. If I add a laptop, it's going to be too heavy to haul around all over campus.
customer_reviews.author: docemeritus

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this messenger bag, It does not fit everything for a college student (Laptop,Books,etc), but for a good price and style, this was a good purchase. Would recommend to anyone wanting to dress more stylish yet carry items around with them, this messenger bag will definitely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Buy! Buy! Buy! No doubt about it.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I have had for over 6 months and I LOVE it!!! Currently it is holding: - MacBook Air - Chromebook - iPad Air - VGA cable - All power cords - A journal - Two remotes - and more!
customer_reviews.author: James Locklin

customer_reviews.title: amazing bag very close to loving it
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks amazing, spacious. there is a pocket inside for an iPad mini the pocket has light padding, unfortunately I couldn't fit my macbook air 11in laptop in it. that's why it gets a four you really can't fit much in that pocket. it also scuffs really easy. it looks really nice though, I can fit my charger wallet extra phone charger head phones calculator. it's a great looking bag for a college student. highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Perez

customer_reviews.title: It all fits, she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter needed one for college but Grandpa didn't want to spend a fortune (cheapskate). This was perfect. She and it are inseparable. It carries her MacBook, real books, paper calculator, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sailndayz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality it was just as pictured I’m sure my husband will love it
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Exceeding Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent looks - better than I had hoped. Lots of pockets for storage and organization. Padded storage for laptop. More than I hoped for - exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: JD Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Go with another bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, quality is good, but the connection of the strap to the bag has come apart after little use and Ive seen this has been a problem for others. Id go with another bag
customer_reviews.author: CrossRunner

customer_reviews.title: Great small messenger bag to carry pens
customer_reviews.text: Great small messenger bag to carry pens, papers, folders, 13'' MacbookPro. I use it in the hospital (I'm a physician) and get compliments all the time about it looking very doctor like.
customer_reviews.author: Pratik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight and medium duty cover. Comfortable to carry on shoulder as well as hand. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and design. I've used it for only a few months, but use it on a regular basis for work. I am able to fit my 13" MacBook along with the charger. I rarely use it for my laptop simply because I find it uncomfortable to carry much in these types of bags (with one hanging strap), but the MacBook certainly fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I've very happy with my order. It's the perfect size for my Chromebook and a few others things. It's stylish and good quality. Love the color. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain about it so far. It does look a lot nicer in person than in the pictures. Also, my 13" rMBP fits securely in the padded area both with a case and protective sleeve. The two front pockets are huge, and not quite sure what I'll be placing in there yet, but they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college student and I prefer "man bags" for when it's hot out to a regular backpack. It's sturdy, smells like leather and it looks good. It'll fit 2 large textbooks and a notebook with no problem. It fits my MacBook Pro great. It's comfortable to carry, the only problem is that if it's in the wrong position the metal fittings may make a squeaking noise. It's great though, I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Had the bag for almost a year and it's still great
customer_reviews.text: While I have other more expensive "brand name" messenger bags, this is my daily go-to bag and bag I travel with. It's been to Israel, Hawaii, Mexico all within a year and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a anniversary gift to my boyfriend. He has used it now for about 6 months with no issues, while usually carrying his 13 inch MacBook, and some material for work. Overall it is made very well and I would recommend to anyone looking to carrying a small laptop, tablet or just a couple of books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish, not super durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother Christmas 2013. 8 months later one of the hinges on the straps broke and he was heart broken. He absolutely loved this bag to death. Said people would even stop him on the street to compliment it. Too bad it didn't last longer... He was able to super glue it back himself at least, and has continued to use it.
customer_reviews.author: AmyElise

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: PLENTY OF ROOM, PLENTY OF POCKETS( 3 OUTSIDE AND 3 POCKETS AND 2 SECTIONS INSIDE) AND DURABLE MATERIALS. LOVE THIS BAG!!
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH R SAXON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for prize
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. Probably one of the best kept secrets of Amazon. The leather of the cover is thick, the belt is confortable. I surely would recommend anybody to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it has help up very well over the last year. I contantly get comments on how good looking my bag is. It has weathered very well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F Brox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It fits my laptop and has plenty of pockets. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN

customer_reviews.title: barely fits my MBP15 inch, but it fits. ...
customer_reviews.text: barely fits my MBP15 inch, but it fits. Also managed to squeeze my Surface Pro 3 in there as well. Chargers, however, have to go in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle X. Hourihan

customer_reviews.title: Ships fast!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The leather has a great rustic look after a little bit of wear and tear. Been using it for a couple of months and it has held up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag! Immediately received compliments, very usable. Its correct, the padded portion is small however there are enough other layers of fabric there shouldn't be any issues. Perhaps I will add padding to bottom for safety,but not sure its necessary
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Neis

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for the price. You probably wouldn't mistake it for a very expensive bag, but def delivers fair value. Only real complaint is the buckle system is v annoying. I just leave it unbuckled.
customer_reviews.author: KilgoreTrout

customer_reviews.title: Awesome daily bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to replace my coaching bag of 5 years. I like the stylishness and functionality of the bag, perfect size with lots of pockets. I like the magnet design that allows opening from the magnets instead of the buckles. I am going to purchase a few of these to give to my brothers ad Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: mike sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Dependable bag that looks vintage and classy. Fits my 14" laptop, portfolio, planner, wireless mouse and charger.Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very stylish and affordable as well. Arrived on time. I am very happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Aziz Khawaja

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a messenger style bag to carry my materials to the school I teach at. This is perfect, just enough leather to give it some style along with a military canvas type bag to give it some personality
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my boyfriend, but I think I may keep it for myself and order him another one. I looove this bag! Well made and seems pretty durable. I am 5 months pregnant so it can also double as a diaper bag for him! Fantastic product with loads of space and large pockets in front and back!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great style, high quality fabric but a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: Great style, high quality fabric but a bit too small. Unable to hold all the stuff I need it to which is not much including my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Phelia Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Not shoes...
customer_reviews.text: No, these are not shoes, but the idea of fit and confort still there.
customer_reviews.author: L. F. Block

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I should have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: R. E.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after about 3 months of use. Material tore at the zipper and then the magnetic holds to close the bag started falling off. Too bad I can't return, but worth noting in case anyone decides to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Codispoti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very well made and steal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisdi29

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING bag!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for my boyfriend as a gift, and it was great! Look at the pictures, as the bag looks exactly like it. I was worried it would run a bit small but it was a good size (my boyfriend is about an average build). He's been using it since! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish, but a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and build of this bag. It's rather small, but enough for me to hold what I need for one class and my 13 inch laptop. At least it prevents me from carrying too much weight around. I just go back to my car between classes to swap out books.
customer_reviews.author: dpep

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! I just wish it was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I just wish it was a little bigger. If you are gonna use it for school, it is great if you don't have a lot of books, but if you do I wouldn't recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: The worst quality
customer_reviews.text: Damage after 3 days ofrece usage, now I can only use it in my hand, the belt broke
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was on time and looked exactly like the picture. The material is good for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Not only gorgeous but so efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag! Colors are neutral so it goes with everything (if that is important to you) classic style that holds my books and Tablet plus other essentials, perfectly. The strap is wide and feels comfortable, but i love that it also has a handle as an option.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag, great size fits the MacBook Pro 13" quite nicely. Good quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great commuter bag for my Macbook Air & other stuff. Inside compartments come in handy for organizing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. The strap is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. The satchel strap is comfortable and be removed easily. In terms of pockets (etc.) it has the perfect built-in sleeve for my Macbook Air 13in laptop, which is snuge enough that I don't bother putting it in a separate one.
customer_reviews.author: Matias Manriquez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag, totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, totally worth it. My strap broke after about 8 months of good useage.... still works great without the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I was looking for. Sturdy, good looking, plenty of pockets, and priced right. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: its looks great but a tad bit smaller than expected but material ...
customer_reviews.text: bought as gift. its looks great but a tad bit smaller than expected but material feels and looks of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jessy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bag
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bag, real leather, interview worthy. My 13in Macbook air fits in fine. Macbook air + sleave will fit in snug. Only small knit picking : theres a zipper on the inside where my laptop sits to where I'm hoping it's not scratching every time I pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: Antonioni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gf for my husband and he absolutely loves it, and carries it wih him everywhere he goes! I will purchase from this seller again!'
customer_reviews.author: C. Lenz

customer_reviews.title: nice baggage
customer_reviews.text: Great look and decent bag though a bit smaller than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vernon Myers III

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Looks just like the picture and the leather fades/wears well over time. The bag actually looks better the longer you have it. The little snaps in the front may get a bit annoying over time, but overall it's a great bag and I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, lovely...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, I take it everywhere, use it for everything, and that leads to getting it completely filthy! Does anyone know if it's machine wash safe?
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days now and I absolutely love it. Its a great bag, I can fit my mac book and a few books in it, has many interior and exterior pockets as well. The leather seems durable and the bags should last a long time. Good purchase and price!!
customer_reviews.author: David Lobo

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I use it everyday and it not only carries my personal stuff it carries my work related stuff. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag with lots of room inside and very stylish. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gather Up
customer_reviews.text: Great deal but when the bag is set to go, the pockets gather above the bag and it doesn't look normal.
customer_reviews.author: GLENH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good looking and surprising well-made, considering the price. It is light, convenient and comfortable to carry. excellent!
customer_reviews.author: egad

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding bag that I use daily for work.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES MCGUFFEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Productive People on the Go!
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the best bag I've owned! With all its compartments and deceptive roominess, this bag simultaneously replaced my purse and old laptop bag.
customer_reviews.author: L.Kellz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! The pictures are a great indication of how it actually looks. More than happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. My bag is as tailored as my ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. My bag is as tailored as my shirts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Crappy quality
customer_reviews.text: The metal piece of the strap broke within less than a few months of use. Not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brown

customer_reviews.title: A very nice messenger bag
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. A fine product at a decent price, given the materials and quality of construction. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Windigo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels good. Appears to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sinbad

customer_reviews.title: Happy Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days, but this product seems well constructed, is a handy size and is simply a good looking bag.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Nelson

customer_reviews.title: canvas bag
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son to carry his Magic cards. he likes it and it seems well made. good product
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful. If I needed a large bag like this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and I can't wait for him to open it. It's beautiful. If I needed a large bag like this, I'd buy one for my self!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Solario

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Stylish and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Stylish and well-made. I wish they made a bigger size, but this is a great bag for small laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Suz I

customer_reviews.title: nice size, not too large but yet holds a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, nice size, not too large but yet holds a surprising amount.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Great quality and well designed. I've packed it full.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, looks exactly as advertised. High quality and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daley Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very well made and was a surprise to my husband. He loves it. The inside pocket is a little too small for his MacBook pro so that is kind of a bummer, but he uses it mostly for school books and work-related documented. Shipping was fast and I actually got it the next day! I was very surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Pouches, and zippers, and straps, oh my!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. My only complaint is that it could be a little more roomy, but that is my own issue, not the bags. For the price you won't get a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E. Israel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this one. Not as advertised, waaaay too small.
customer_reviews.author: MiNoS

product_meta.title: Gootium Canvas Leather Messenger Bag - Vintage Briefcase 14" 15.6" Laptop Shoulder Bag
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :15.6 x 4.33 x 11.81 inches; 2.35 Pounds
 * Item model number :21108BR-L
 * Department :Unisex-adult (luggage only)
 * Date First Available :April 17, 2017
 * ASIN :B017U0C988

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank:  *  #3738 inLaptop Messenger & Shoulder Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars13 ratings
feature_bullets: Material: This vintage messenger bag was made from high quality washed canvas and Crazy-horse leather, which has retro style and long lasting durability.
Dimensions: (L) 15.6" x (W) 4.1" x (H) 11.8"; Item weighs 2.7 lbs. Fit for laptop up to 15.6-inch and A4 documents/folders/magazine.

Features: The classic appearance was embellished with crazy-horse leather trim, well made hardware like zippers, rivet fasteners and the magnetic snaps totally bring it a exquisite and fashionable outlook.

Practical messenger bag: Detachable strap along with the top handle offer different ways to carry this retro messenger bag. Interior compartment fits laptop up to 15.6 inch, which make it an ideal briefcase for business occasions.

Considerate details: The cross-body shoulder strap connecting to the bag in double secure way (enhanced stitching & metal rivets) can be easily adjusted to fit everyone’s need. Interior compartment lined with soft fabric and the bottom was padded to better protect your personal belongings.
